directions: Whisk barbeque sauce, rice vinegar, and oil in a large bowl until smooth. Stir in corn kernels, red bell pepper, green onions, and white beans to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
ingredients: 2 ears corn, kernels cut from cob
1 (14.5 ounce) can white beans, drained and rinsed
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Sufferin' Succotash Salad
